title: The Favorites - NFL Week 11 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 11 Gambling Preview
description:
Sure, a few other podcasts in the sports gambling industry might be brave enough to recommend betting the Houston Texans this week. But where else in the media landscape will you hear Mac Jones referred to as a "Which Nipple Quarterback?" Only right here on The Favorites.

Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman is joined by pro gambler Simon Hunter as they dissect the NFL Week 11 board, discussing a great spot for the Indianapolis Colts, a potential no-fly zone on the Raiders, and the Vikings as the short home 'dog. Plus, we get a Scooch Roulette pick, a Foxhole bet, and our Simon Says play for Week 11.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
